title: ☑️ Dependency Dashboard
body:
This issue lists Renovate updates and detected dependencies. Read the [Dependency Dashboard](https://docs.renovatebot.com/key-concepts/dashboard/) docs to learn more.
[View this repository on the Mend.io Web Portal](https://developer.mend.io/github/PFCCLab/dochooks). ## Open These updates have all been created already. Click a checkbox below to force a retry/rebase of any. - [ ] [⬆️ deps: Update astral-sh/setup-uv action to v6](../pull/52) ## Detected dependencies
github-actions
.github/workflows/lint-and-fmt.yml - `actions/checkout v4` - `astral-sh/setup-uv v5` - `actions/setup-python v5` - `extractions/setup-just v3`
.github/workflows/release.yml - `actions/checkout v4` - `astral-sh/setup-uv v5` - `actions/setup-python v5` - `extractions/setup-just v3` - `actions/upload-artifact v4` - `actions/download-artifact v4` - `actions/download-artifact v4` - `softprops/action-gh-release v2` - `python 3.x`
.github/workflows/unit-test.yml - `actions/checkout v4` - `astral-sh/setup-uv v5` - `actions/setup-python v5` - `extractions/setup-just v3`
pep621
